---
title: Sharp-Purser Test
subtitle: Special test for the Transverse Ligament of the Atlas
---



# Technique 

- Pinch the patient's C2 SP between your fingers
- With your opposite arm, place the patient's forehead in your elbow
- Apply no pressure
- Have the patient move into flexion until they report symptoms
- Use your elbow to posteriorly translate the occiput and ask patient if symptoms change
